import React from 'react' const Identity = ({ nextStep, prevStep, values }) => { console.log(values.tax_id_type); // handle continue const handleContinue = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (values.given_name === '') { values.setGivenNameError('Name is required'); } else if (values.family_name === '') { values.setFamilyNameError('Famil name is required'); } else if (values.date_of_birth === '') { values.setDateOfBirthError('Date of birth is required'); } else if (values.country_of_tax_residency === '') { values.setCountryOfTaxResidencyError('Country of tax residency is required.') } else if (values.funding_source === '') { values.setFundingSourceError('Funding source is required'); } else { nextStep() } } // handleBack const handleBack = (e) => { e.preventDefault() prevStep(); } const taxType = [ 'USA_SSN', 'ARG_AR_CUIT', 'AUS_TFN', 'AUS_ABN', 'BOL_NIT', 'BRA_CPF', 'CHL_RUT', 'COL_NIT', 'CRI_NITE', 'DEU_TAX_ID', 'DOM_RNC', 'ECU_RUC', 'FRA_SPI', 'GBR_UTR', 'GBR_NINO', 'GTM_NIT', 'HND_RTN', 'HUN_TIN', 'IDN_KTP', 'IND_PAN', 'ISR_TAX_ID', 'ITA_TAX_ID', 'JPN_TAX_ID', 'MEX_RFC', 'NIC_RUC', 'NLD_TIN', 'PAN_RUC', 'PER_RUC', 'PRY_RUC', 'SGP_NRIC', 'SGP_FIN', 'SGP_ASGD', 'SGP_ITR', 'SLV_NIT', 'SWE_TAX_ID', 'URY_RUT', 'VEN_RIF', 'NOT_SPECIFIED' ] const visa = [ 'B1', 'B2', 'DACA', 'E1', 'E2', 'E3', 'F1', 'G4', 'H1B', 'J1', 'L1', 'Other', 'O1', 'TN1' ] console.log(values.funding_source) return (

Identity

values.setGivenName(e.target.value)} />
{values.given_name_error && {values.given_name_error}}
values.setFamilyName(e.target.value)} />
{values.family_name_error && {values.family_name_error}}
values.setDateOfBirth(e.target.value)} />
{values.date_of_birth_error && {values.date_of_birth_error}}
values.setTaxId(e.target.value)} disabled={values.tax_id_type == '' ? true : false} />
values.setCountryOfCitizenship(e.target.value)} />
values.setCountryOfBirth(e.target.value)} />
values.setCountryOfTaxResidency(e.target.value)} />
{values.country_of_tax_residency_error && {values.country_of_tax_residency_error}}
values.setVisaExpirationDate(e.target.value)} />
values.setDateOfDeperatureFromUsa(e.target.value)} />
values.setPermanentResident(e.target.value)} placeholder="Permanent Residence" />
{values.funding_source_error && {values.funding_source_error}}
values.setAnnualIncomeMin(e.target.value)} placeholder='Annual income min' />
values.setAnnualIncomeMax(e.target.value)} placeholder='Annual income max' />
values.setLiquidNetWorthMin(e.target.value)} placeholder='liquid net worth min' />
values.setLiquidNetWorthMax(e.target.value)} placeholder='liquid net worth max' />
values.setTotalNetWorthMin(e.target.value)} placeholder='Total net worth min' />
values.setTotalNetWorthMax(e.target.value)} placeholder='Total net worth max' />
) } export default Identity
